summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2142, for the improvement of 21st Avenue Southwest, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by construction thereon wood walks and stairways; and the temporary grading of 21st Avenue Southwest from West Andover Street to Colby Street, and Colby Street from 21st Avenue Southwest to 20th Avenue Southwest; under Ordinance No. 21541 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
